title: Indians bad attitude and civic senses. No respect for country.
selftext: Your doctors and health gurus advice you to not take stress and all that but it's just impossible in this country. You wake up fresh in the morning and get ready to go to work with a good mood but half of your energy for the day gets drained in the commute itself..no matter private or public transport. This 'adjust karlo' attitude needs to go.
comments:
Ye india me har jagah ka situation hai.
Man karta hai utarke ek ek ko 4-5 laafa laga du…
Pata nahi kya soch k opposite lane se overtake karte hai.. sach me unpadh gawar log bhare hai desh me…
